About.system_description: The ASIST testbed provides an environment for research into human/AI teams.
About.darpa_acknolwedgement: The ASIST project is sponsored by DARPA

ASI_CMU_TA1_ATLAS.up: cd ./Agents/ASI_CMU_TA1_ATLAS && echo 'Bringing up the CMU TA1 Atlas Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env up -d
ASI_CMU_TA1_ATLAS.down: cd ./Agents/ASI_CMU_TA1_ATLAS && echo 'Bringing down the CMU TA1 Atlas Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env down

atomic_agent.up: cd ./Agents/atomic_agent && echo 'Bringing up the Atomic Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env up -d
atomic_agent.down: cd ./Agents/atomic_agent && echo 'Bringing down the Atomic Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env down

ASI_CRA_TA1_psicoach.up: cd ./Agents/ASI_CRA_TA1_psicoach && echo 'Bringing up the CRA PSI-Coach Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env up -d
ASI_CRA_TA1_psicoach.down: cd ./Agents/ASI_CRA_TA1_psicoach && echo 'Bringing down the CRA PSI-Coach Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env down

ASI_DOLL_TA1_RITA.down: cd ./Agents/Rita_Agent && echo 'Bringing down the Rita Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env down

sift_asistant.up: cd ./Agents/SIFT_Asistant_Agent && echo 'Bringing up the SIFT Asistant Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env up -d
sift_asistant.down: cd ./Agents/SIFT_Asistant_Agent && echo 'Bringing down the SIFT Asistant Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env down

ASI_UAZ_TA1_ToMCAT.up: cd ./Agents/ASI_UAZ_TA1_ToMCAT && echo 'Bringing up the UAZ Tomcat (TMM) Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env up -d
ASI_UAZ_TA1_ToMCAT.down: cd ./Agents/ASI_UAZ_TA1_ToMCAT && echo 'Bringing down the UAZ Tomcat (TMM) Agent' && docker compose --env-file settings.env down
